ValidationRule.description: Require "LMS Order Number" on "Invoice Case Sub Type": Duplicate Invoice, Grants, Price, Why Bill to Chapter, Wrong Organization, and Other
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Dispute_Issue__c , "Duplicate Invoice"), ISPICKVAL( Dispute_Issue__c , 'Customer Service Credit'), ISPICKVAL( Dispute_Issue__c , "Grants"), ISPICKVAL( Dispute_Issue__c , "Price"), ISPICKVAL( Dispute_Issue__c , "Why Bill to Chapter"), ISPICKVAL( Dispute_Issue__c , "Wrong Organization"), ISPICKVAL( Dispute_Issue__c , "Other") ), ( Order_Number__c = ""), (RecordTypeId <> "012d000000097TB"), (RecordTypeId <> "012d000000097TC"), $Setup.Validation_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = false )
